Posts.Content: Jan 28, 2009 04:48AM taz_in_teen wrote: thank you for your help... actually...i didn't really have a good look at my breasts until i was sixteen...and since then, i had found my left nipple inwards. and i thought about talking to my mother about this...but my grandfather is in a critical condition and she is too worried about him...so i just don't know how to go about it...
Posts.Title: a scared teenager taz_in_teen apple

Posts.Content: taz_in_teen wrote: i m 18...a student.... i didn't really know much about breast cancer until i recently read a news article about its symptoms....one of which was inverted nipples and its discharge. one of my nipples remains inward and if i get that out, after a little while, it again gets back to its previous position. i found a white, sticky sort of substance on it a few times as well...but it was very little. and i felt a bit of pain in both the breasts a couple of months ago....although it was not too serious and went away a little later. i m really shy and introverted.....so i can't really think of discussing this with my mom....and so visiting a doctor is just not possible for me alone. so....i am very worried and afraid.....and need help from someone older.
